settings.title: Add Items to cart
settings.text: Find products by browsing product category menus or searching for a product via the search bar. Once you have found a product that you would like to buy, click ‘add to cart’.

settings.title: Manage your cart
settings.text:
Click on the cart icon to view all items and the total price. To make changes, click ‘edit cart’. You will be able to remove items, change number of items, and apply a promo code (member code) to receive a special discount. Press, ‘Proceed to check out’ to continue to the next step.

*If you do not have a promo code (member code) you may contact a friend who is a member of aviance or join to become a member and receive 25% discount on all future orders.

settings.title: Order summary
settings.text: If you haven’t already, log in to your account for a faster checkout process. Shipping and personal information will automatically be filled (if the information has been provided before). In this step you may edit the shipping address, billing address, and delivery method.

settings.title: Complete order
settings.text:
Once all information has been placed, click ‘next’ to review your order. You may still edit your order and order information at this stage. To place order, click ‘Proceed to payment.’

Once the order process is complete, a ‘Thank You’ page will confirm that your order has been placed successfully. You will receive a confirmation email with your order details within 24 hours of the purchase. If you do not receive an email, please contact us at +(66)2-554-2455​ or email us at unilevernetwork.th@unilever.com for further assistance.

settings.title: What is Unilever Life?
settings.desc: Unilever is a global consumer goods company. We successfully achieved over 400 brands which are used by 2.5 billion people worldwide each day. Today, Unilever has introduced our new business platform called Unilever Life for whoever is interested in joining us as our "Business Partner" to earn passive income with our quality health and beauty products.

settings.title: Fast Start
settings.desc: No prior experience is required here at Unilever Life. Just register as our Business Partner with a low registration fee of only 600 THB. We will provide holistic supporting platforms for you.

settings.title: Well - Being Family
settings.desc: Apart from having a satisfying income, you can also take good care of your family and yourself through our quality health and beauty products. Health is the greatest wealth and the biggest gift you could ever give to yourself and your loved ones.

settings.title: Rewarding Life
settings.desc: Don't have to choose between work and family because at Unilever Life you can have it all. Unilever Life offers you the balance between wealth, health, and family time. Enjoy the freedom of lifestyle while rewarding your life with trips around the world without affecting your work life.

settings.title: Retire Rich
settings.desc: Unilever Life is designed for generating passive income with our leverage business model. Just build your business as a value-added asset and this business will provide you with income at every step of your life. This is the opportunity for you to set your retirement time of your choice.

settings.title: Member Privileges
settings.text:
Receive exclusive privileges and immensely opportunities for becoming our Business Partner.

Getting special offers, discounts for health and beauty products, cash bonus from gaining more customers and team building, and numerous rewards - exclusive VIP travel trips, seminars, rewarding experiences that you can't find elsewhere. READ MORE

settings.title: Unilever Life Product
settings.text:
We seek to give a unique and valuable experience to our customers by strengthening health, building confidence, and creating satisfying results through innovative health and beauty products. Every single ingredient is meticulously selected from the best places in the world. Certified best results from credible sources.

Above all, we ensure that we make sustainable living commonplace by reducing our environmental footprint and embedded sustainability across our value chain.

settings.title: Community
settings.text:
Good friendship and warm society might be overlooked by many businesses, but Unilever Life looks up to its importance and designs our business model accordingly.

Our business model focused on supporting each other and sharing success with one another. Meeting new friends with the same passion, expanding business skills through engaging activities, sharing valuable experiences, and deliver positive energy to each other. With this business model, we'll create a warm and welcoming community that is filled with exceptional friendships.

READ MORE

settings.title: Jerry Louise
settings.mb_intro: Unilever Life Business Platform is the key to my financial freedom. I do not have to worry about working capital because I have enough cash flow. Unilever Life is the best business partner. The platform provides every necessity for business investment such as innovative products and product research and development. There are efficient digital sales and traditional sales systems as well as logistic systems. I am able to make 7-figure income monthly because of these total services.
settings.content:
Financial Freedom from Unilever Life 

Unilever Life Business Platform is the key to my financial freedom. I do not have to worry about working capital because I have enough cash flow. Unilever Life is the best business partner. The platform provides every necessity for business investment such as innovative products and product research and development. There are efficient digital sales and traditional sales systems as well as logistic systems. I am able to make 7-figure income monthly because of these total services. 

I am now almost 60 years old. People may think it is time for retirement with no more income. However, this is not my case because Unilever Life helps me generate everlasting passive income. This is exactly my ideal financial freedom.

settings.title: Nueng-ruethai Rattanabuachoom
settings.mb_intro: People who only rely on single income without any other plans may fall down badly when facing unprecedented challenges. Fortunately, I got to know the Unilever Life business. I started simply by using some products to prove if they are effective. I witnessed my own positive results from using the skincare lines and food supplements.
settings.content:
The Airline Industry Hit Hard by the Pandemic. Luckily, I have found my way out.

People who only rely on single income without any other plans may fall down badly when facing unprecedented challenges. Fortunately, I got to know the Unilever Life business. I started simply by using some products to prove if they are effective. I witnessed my own positive results from using the skincare lines and food supplements. 

People around me also noticed the differences and asked me what I have been using. And the word of mouth does its magic. Eventually, Unilever Life has become my business and helped me get through the crisis. It is absolutely true that opportunity can be found in the crisis.

I am blessed to find the opportunity provided by Unilever Life which brings such a huge positive change to my life.

settings.title: Tananrat Jaraslertsiri
settings.mb_intro: It is a simple fact that profit and loss in business is common. Many entrepreneurs have experienced the Tom Yum Kung financial crisis, flood crisis and very recently COVID-19.
settings.content:
As an entrepreneur, I look for more opportunities in other businesses to strengthen success and eliminate risks.

It is a simple fact that profit and loss in business is common. Many entrepreneurs have experienced the Tom Yum Kung financial crisis, flood crisis and very recently COVID-19. 

The key to success probably does not lie in running a single business especially in the age of digital transformation. 

I am certain that being a part of Unilever Life is the right decision. I no longer have to worry about cash flow, employment or capital cost. Moreover, the business is about beauty and wellness which definitely is the industry of today and tomorrow.

settings.title: Athipat Thongchan
settings.mb_intro: I believe that many people long for an individual desired lifestyle. I also do. To realise our ideal life, we cannot just sit still and wait for it to happen but we must make it happen.
settings.content:
Travel is my passion for which I am responsible. 

I believe that many people long for an individual desired lifestyle. I also do. To realise our ideal life, we cannot just sit still and wait for it to happen but we must make it happen.  

Even though I was born into poverty, I never gave up. I started Unilever Life with a small amount of money. I kept working tirelessly and the result went beyond my expectation. I have been able to visit many countries. Travelling the world is the lifestyle I earn from making the decision to join Unilever Life.

settings.title: Nubduen Sang-nak
settings.mb_intro: When I was a state enterprise employee, I kept asking myself the same question. ‘Is this the right career for me?’ and the answer was always a hundred  percent no.
settings.content:
To Make Time for The Beloved Ones is My Ultimate Happiness. 

When I was a state enterprise employee, I kept asking myself the same question. ‘Is this the right career for me?’ and the answer was always a hundred  percent no. 

I want to run my own business which generates enough income and allows me to have time for my mother and my grandmother. Besides that, I also want to stay mentally and physically healthy to be able to keep up with work and live happily.

I have chosen Unilever Life where I can schedule my own working hours and make a stable income. Moreover, it is really great that the products are all about beauty and wellness.

These days apart from financial stability, I also have all the time in the world. And the most important thing is I am perfectly healthy and happy.

settings.title: Pochara Dechapatarawasu
settings.mb_intro: I believe that many people want to have their own business,especially with digital platforms. I am one of those. Luckily, I have found Unilever Life which provides a great support system. I joined the company without any hesitation.
settings.content:
I started business via digital platforms with Unilever Life when I was a third year university student. 

I believe that many people want to have their own business,especially with digital platforms. I am one of those. Luckily, I have found Unilever Life which provides a great support system. I joined the company without any hesitation. 

The company invests and takes care of all important factors such as innovative product development, digital and traditional back office support services and logistics operations.

For young generations like me who are into digital marketing, a big amount of capital investment is not needed. The important tool to find customers and business partners is social media. We can adjust our platforms any way we want to capture our main target’s interest.

Unilever Life is the right answer for young adults who want to start their own business.

settings.title: Oranong Siriwanich
settings.mb_intro: I am one of those who are office workers. However, I also seeked for extra income to create financial stability in the early state of my professional life.
settings.content:
These days, extra income is a must! 

I am one of those who are office workers. However, I also seeked for extra income to create financial stability in the early state of my professional life. 

Thankfully, I have found Unilever Life which I can work on while being a full time employee. I still cannot believe that it took only three years until I have more income from Unilever Life business than the salary from my full time job. 

We are now facing the pandemic along with financial crisis. I encourage everyone to be financially prepared because we cannot just solely rely on our full time career. The extra income is truly necessary and Unilever Life is absolutely a great option to help anyone survive in this challenging moment.

settings.title: Paranee Boolong
settings.mb_intro: A fresh graduate’s monthly salary is not enough to provide a good life for my only daughter. My husband and I had two choices. We either generate more income or downsize our dreams. We chose the first and decided to keep going forward.
settings.content:
From Part Time Job to Main Household Income which provides education abroad opportunities for my daughter.

A fresh graduate’s monthly salary is not enough to provide a good life for my only daughter. My husband and I had two choices. We either generate more income or downsize our dreams. We chose the first and decided to keep going forward.

Eventually, we have found a business opportunity from Unilever Life which allows us to live our dreams. I feel thankful that my husband and I were willing to try out this business. Now we can clearly see our daughter’s bright future. As a parent, this is my true happiness.

settings.title: MY ORDERS

settings.description: You can effectively and conveniently manage your information at "My account." You can set your wish list or favorite list, track orders and returns, edit profile, manage address book, or track and trace your order HERE!

settings.title: Community
settings.text:
Good friendship and warm society might be overlooked by many businesses, but Unilever Life looks up to its importance and designs our business model accordingly.

Our business model focused on supporting each other and sharing success with one another. Meeting new friends with the same passion, expanding business skills through engaging activities, sharing valuable experiences, and deliver positive energy to each other. With this business model, we’ll create a warm welcoming community that is filled with exceptional friendships.

settings.title: Build a community of friendship through world traveling
settings.text: Enjoy the international trip awards with your family and Unilever Life team. Build friendship with new business partners and discover VIP and memorable experiences abroad with your beloved ones.

settings.title: Create a community of learning through seminars and training courses
settings.text: Learning and expanding skills through exclusive seminars, national-level speakers, numerous workshops, online courses. Also, receiving valuable teaching and knowledge from experienced business coaches and other business partners.

settings.title: Experience a community of sharing through CSR activities
settings.text: Unilever Life’s real joy is to volunteer to help the community blood donation to Thai Red Cross, build libraries and toilets for students of the Border Patrol Police School in the border areas.

settings.title: Discover a community of happiness through relationship bonding activities
settings.text: Enjoy bonding activities to build relationships among business partners along with expanding and strengthening Unilever Life business partner family.

settings.title: Before becoming Unilever Life’s health and beauty products,
settings.text: we pay close attention to selecting the best ingredients. There are countless researches, from legendary findings to the latest academic research. No matter where the ingredients are in the world, we never cease to achieve it and meticulously put it in our products with the purpose to give our customers the ultimate experience via Unilever Life products.

settings.title: Let’s get to know our meticulously selected and high-quality key ingredients.
Maqui Berry
settings.subText: The key ingredient of the super anti-oxidant beyonde Maqui Plus
settings.text: The legendary superfruit is renowned as the “King of Antioxidants.” This dark purple fruit has been famous for centuries due to the Mapuche warriors from Southern Chile, strong native Indians, who were able to fight against the colonial-era Spanish armies. Their secret weapon is the “Sacred Fruit” or Maqui Berry. With high Anthocyanin, Maqui Berry is enriched with high antioxidants and eventually known for the “King of Antioxidants.”

settings.title: Indian Gooseberry
settings.subText: The key ingredient of beyonde Indian Goose Berry Drinking Powder
settings.text: Indian gooseberry, known in the Indian language as Amla or Amlika, is the first plant in the universe according to Indian legend. Indian gooseberry has been used in health care for more than 3,000 years as a component in a variety of herbal medicine formulations that use holistic health care to balance sugar and fat. The Indian Gooseberry contains various nutrients, vitamins, and minerals, such as tannin and polyphenols. It also has a unique flavor that combined the 5 flavors: sour, bitter, pungent, astringent, and sweet. With its power, Indian Gooseberry can balance blood, slow down the degeneration of the body, help digestion and excretion, and enhance immunity.

settings.title: Arabian Cotton Extract
settings.subText: The key ingredient of aviance UV Expert Gluta Orange SPF 50+ / PA ++++
settings.text: Amid the arid and sweltering deserts, Arabian cotton trees in the Arab territories still flourish. Consequently, we seek to solve the stem cell puzzle of this sun-resistant cotton. This cotton is found to be filled with important substances that protect themselves from sunlight and heatwaves. Accordingly, it reduces enzymes that damage collagen when exposed to infrared radiation.

settings.title: Due to our meticulously selected ingredients and latest modern production standards,
settings.text: you can be sure that Unilever Life products will meet your health and beauty needs.

settings.title: Formulation
settings.text: In addition to possessing excellent ingredients, Unilever Life also places great importance on designing health and beauty product formulations that will bring the highest efficiency from key ingredients. We strive for the best results for all our customers.

settings.title: This is one of our innovative technology achievements in research and development at Unilever Life.
Multi Defense & Protection
settings.subText: The innovative technology of aviance UV Expert Gluta Orange SPF 50+ / PA ++++
settings.text: A milky sunscreen serum from an innovative Korean formula that does not only protects the skin from UVA rays in the sun, which causes premature skin, and sunburn UVB rays, but also protects your skin from Blue Light, supporting a digital lifestyle where consumers spend hours on their mobile and tablet devices each day. Our sunscreen serum also protects your skin from free radicals that come with dust and pollution. It’s the ultimate protection that protects your skin holistically.

settings.title: Unique Mix & Match Serums
settings.subText: The innovative technology of skincare serum - aviance ONE
settings.text: Each person has different types of skin. Moreover, a person’s skin also changes throughout the day. The skin needs a different type of nourishment according to the different relaxation, weather, and other factors. This is why Unilever Life innovatively formulated a skincare serum called aviance ONE set, where you can Mix & Match different serums in the set. It is designed for suiting consumer skin’s own needs, whether it’s for brightening, hydrating, or firming. The product leaves powerful revitalization of the plant’s stem cells to help you recover overnight.

settings.title: Gluta Shine Technology
settings.subText: The innovative technology of aviance Aura Booster
settings.text: Aura Booster is formulated with specialized glutathione, which is more stable. It is designed to directly boost skin right away and give skin the power of antioxidants. The product reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, brightens skin while leaving a youthful and aura appearance to the user.

settings.title: Unilever Life has never overlooked the details at each stage of producing a product to provide maximized quality and performance of a world-class product that you can rely on.

settings.content:
TRANSFORMING
LIVES
FOR LIFE
JOIN US

settings.title: Jerry - Jane Looi
settings.mb_intro: A businessman with an income of a million baht per month has accumulated more than 200 million THB from Unilever Life. At first, he had over 18 million THB debt from his phone business during the Tom Yum Kung crisis.
settings.content:
A businessman with an income of a million baht per month has accumulated more than 200 million THB from Unilever Life. At first, he had over 18 million THB debt from his phone business during the Tom Yum Kung crisis. Afterward, Jerry and Jane began to seek new business opportunities to help pay their debts.

They spent a full six months studying about being a business partner of credible companies that have high-quality products. Eventually, they decided to join Unilever Life. “Do it right away. Do it everywhere. Do it!” is Jerry and Jane’s motto. They had an initial investment of only a hundred. However, with their strong commitment and Unilever Life’s platforms, they can eventually pay their debt within 2 years. To this day, they have accumulated over 200 million baht. And they are more than ready to continue this success.

Unilever Life, an independent business that rewards him and his family throughout the business with not only wealth but also offers work-life balance, self-managed business, a bright future, and invaluable happiness to pass on great health to others through quality products. Their next ambition is to create great opportunities for others through the Unilever Life business. They believe that with great inspiration and strong belief, nothing is “impossible.”

settings.title: Ornong Siriwanij - Sasipin Siriwanij
settings.mb_intro: A former marketer of a big company who has always dreamt of joining a world-class company like Unilever. As soon as she heard of Unilever's new business, Unilever Life, she immediately joined Unilever Life without hesitation. As a business partner, she was able to sustainably create passive income for her and her family.
settings.content:
A former marketer of a big company who has always dreamt of joining a world-class company like Unilever. As soon as she heard of Unilever's new business, Unilever Life, she immediately joined Unilever Life without hesitation. As a business partner, she was able to sustainably create passive income for her and her family.

Unilever Life doesn't just fulfill Oranong's dream as a marketer, but it also fulfills her life in a variety of ways. At first, she joined Unilever Life while she still worked as a full-time employee in her former company for 2 years. While she still worked for two jobs, she earned hundreds of thousands of THB per month. This was when she decided to quit her job and started focusing fully on Unilever Life. Today, her business has accumulated revenue from Unilever Life of more than 50 million baht.

Her success can be measured by the financial freedom that she can fully support her family and enjoy her freedom in time. Also, this freedom has enabled her to take full care of her father as he was hospitalized until his last breath. Now, she still has time to take care of her mother. For her, Unilever life is more than just a business that generates income, but a business that offers time and opportunity to live with someone she loves, which is more valuable than anything else.

settings.title: Visootr - Sarintip Dachapattaravasu
settings.mb_intro:
Unilever Life is a low-investment business platform containing numerous brands, innovation, and an automatic income system (passive income). 

The business can also be transferred as a heritage to your child. These are the key factors that influence Visootr, a finance and investment executive in a financial institution.

From his experience in analyzing small to big businesses, investment is what they all have in common. Starting requires investment and expanding the business also needs investment. Every step of running the business requires investment and loans. For this reason, Visootr has never thought of having his own business. However, after he knew about Unilever Life's concept, he decided to move forward with Unilever Life business. 

“Running a business that requires 100% work from one person or a business that requires 1% work from 100 people,” is an idea of Unilever Life business model that truly touch Visootr’s heart. He is excited about the automatic income system and four-sided framework that Unilever Life provided. Despite running Unilever Life as a part-time job along with his full-time job, he earned three times his salary in just two years. This is when he decided to focus his whole time on Unilever Life and accumulated revenue of over 50 million THB.

settings.title: Parranee - Tassapon Boolong
settings.mb_intro:
An unexpected event happened to Parranee when her husband, Tassapon, got fatally shot on duty causing a major shift in responsibility within the family. Parranee had to take care of everything, including her husband, young daughter, and work a full-time job along with running Unilever Life business. 

Parranee was an ordinary employee and Tassapon was a police officer. Once they got married and had their beloved daughter, they both searched for an extra income that would give their daughter the best quality of life. Planee chose to start her second job at Unilever Life. It was when her husband was in the hospital after the shooting that Unilever Life had turned from an extra income to the family’s main income. 

Parranee decided to quit her full-time job and focus all of her time on Unilever Life. She generated income three times more than her full-time job salary, earning a hundred thousand THB per month. Regardless of being in a wheelchair after the shooting, Tassapon continued his success in Unilever Life business. They both became a determined business partner who had accumulated revenue of over 50 million THB. Everyone in the family lives a good quality of life as they both had initially aimed. Unilever Life business offers equal opportunities for everyone regardless of one’s experience, knowledge, or health. Tassapon has proved to everyone that running a business to success is not impossible if one has determination and never gives up.

settings.title: Suphattra - Prakit Hongwisat
settings.mb_intro:
From a million THB loans that they initially seek to create a better life for their child, it turned to a business shut down. Causing the husband, a military officer, and wife, a full-time employee, to use almost all of their income on paying off their debts almost every month. One time, they were left with only 500 THB so they had to walk five kilometers without taking a bus to buy milk for their child. Although the investment had ended up as a massive debt, they were never discouraged and always looked for new opportunities.

Unlike other businesses, Unilever Life only requires an investment of hundreds of baht, learning, and product experience sharing. Also, Unilever Life offers business coaching by professional business coaches, unlike other businesses that one has to hire high-priced mentors by oneself. Within the first year, both earned hundreds of thousands of income. Seeing the business opportunity, Suphattra decided to resign from a full-time job.

With Unilever’s hundreds of years of experience, a clear goal, and a strong commitment of Prakit and Suphattra, they have accumulated over 10 million THB and improved the life quality of the whole family. They were able to send their child to study abroad. The result of their hard work at Unilever Life is very rewarding. In addition to passive income, Unilever Life offers a lifetime experience of traveling to dozens of countries, self-development, and sustainably changed their lives for the better.

settings.title: Aphiwatch Wiboonwattanakul
settings.mb_intro:
When being a bank employee did not give him the happiness and wealth he wanted, Aphiwatch shift to investment in an audit firm instead. However, he had to experience unbearable and inconsistent costs as well as business risks. On the other hand, Unilever Life has no risk and does not requires high investment but offers a worthy return.

Aphiwatch has been through many businesses, but what makes him love about Unilever Life is the learning system and development courses that unlock the potential and personality as well as the consistent development of product innovation. Consequently, the business contributes satisfying income, provides good health and gives good ideas

He has proven that Unilever Life is the right business which meets his expectation in life. Therefore, he continues to move forward and build Unilever Life business using the concept of passive income and inspire people who wanted to change their lives with happiness and wealth.

Today, Aphiwatch has accumulated more than 50 million THB of income, owning many properties and real estate. He enjoys the financial freedom and time that Unilever Life has given him. He gets to spend his life with the kind of lifestyle he prefers and win dozens of travel rewards from running Unilever Life business.

settings.title: Athipat Thongchan
settings.mb_intro:
A young man who turned his life from having nothing to having it all. He started with nothing, not good at school, poor, and not good looking. However, his life goal is certain and clear. He desired to have freedom in life while earning a 6-figure income per month. He started his business, but it did not go well. However, Unilever Life changes his life in all dimensions. 

Having business knowledge from reading multiple books, he decided to pursue his dream by opening a restaurant and a tree shop after graduating. Nonetheless, the business shut down after one month, making him realized that doing business is never easy. Then, he shifted his path to become a salesman at an agricultural chemical company, earning 8-9 thousand THB a month. However, running the Unilever Life business, although as a part-time job, earned him 7 thousand THB per month. This was when he decided to resign from his full-time job and fully participate in Unilever Life. He trusted in the business’ platform and seek to generate passive income from the business.

He started this business from having only an old motorcycle, but he was very confident in the products and business. So, no matter what the obstacles, he would overcome it all. In his mid-thirties, he earned over 100,000 THB per month and finally bought his first car and house. Also, he was able to buy 5 acres of land as a gift to the family. Not only having a good income and a successful career, but he also has a new look and character of a businessman. Proving that Unilever Life business has gone beyond his dream.

settings.title: Suppakorn Numnoi
settings.mb_intro:
An engineering student who dreamed of working as an engineer after graduated. However, during his second year at university, he found an opportunity to earn an extra income through Unilever Life business. At first, he thought of achieving only four to 5 thousand THB per month. Consequently, he started running the business without earning a single baht. After he talked with his business coach, the coach introduced him to a new idea that changed his way of running the business. “A full-time employee who earns fifteen thousand income has to also study and learn. Therefore, this business that gives you hundreds of thousands of baht a month also needs studying and learning to succeed.” After this, he started to take classes and study and finally earned twenty thousand baht per month. Unfortunately, his grandmother had cancer during his fourth year at university. Luckily, Unilever Life business still generated 5,000-12,000 THB a month. Since then, he truly understands the word passive income.

After graduating, Suppakorn decided to give his full time to Unilever Life business with a goal to achieve 100,000 baht per month. And he finally achieves his goal! A steady and continuous six-figure income allows him to design his own life and have a free lifestyle. He can finally buy a car and a house for his parents and take them on a trip abroad. 

He perceives Unilever Life as a business that answers the true meaning of “life value,” which is not only just a source of 6- or 7-figure income but the sharing of success to others. Therefore, his next big goal is to pass on knowledge, encourage people to change their lives and find success, just like him.

settings.title: Chanatsanan - Kittipong Kampujantarin
settings.mb_intro: The couple has been through countless life tests. From a 12 million debt of the family’s construction business to selling almost every asset to pay off their debts. They opened a Thai food papaya
settings.content:
The couple has been through countless life tests. From a 12 million debt of the family’s construction business to selling almost every asset to pay off their debts. They opened a Thai food papaya restaurant and many more to provide money to the family. However, it never ends well.

When the couple knew about Unilever Life business, they decided to join as they believed in Unilever. Although they do not believe in the business concept at first as they perceived the business as pestering their friends to buy the product. But when they studied the business opportunity, they finally understand that this is a great opportunity to generate income for all. With massive debt, they both aimed to succeed as fast as possible. They learned from successful business partners and apply the advice from business coaches to their business. Despite any capital to live in Korat, they used to pawn gold to earn cash for transportation costs to Bangkok to learn Unilever Life business.

After a two-year focus on the business, the couple earned 100,000 THB a month. Today, they have accumulated more than 30 million baht. The business has transformed the couple's family, pay off debt, and own real estate. Above all, they get to take care of their parents whom they love and travel the world with them. In the past, they don’t have these opportunities as they were struggling to live. However, now they both receive travel rewards and have experiences that could not be found elsewhere.

One of the most important life tests was when their son suffers from chronic kidney disease. He had to stay in the hospital for about eight months a year. Although they don’t have as much time to focus on the business as before, income from Unilever Life never decreases. Making them not worry about medical costs and fully spend time to take care of the son. This confirms the free lifestyle that offers both time and passive income.

settings.title: Chumpol Luengbunjerd
settings.mb_intro:
An executive engineer of a big electronic Japanese company had always believed that this job was the right job and hoped to entrust his future to the company. However, his belief changed when his boss was immediately fired from the company, making him quickly rethink about his future.

The first time he listened to the introduction of Unilever Life business opportunity he did not take it seriously as he came because his friend asked him to. He just thought of buying the products and use them on this own. He tried running the business for seven months and started to earn consistent income each month, making him felt more interested in the business. 

When he started to learn about the business from his business coaches and Unilever Life, he unlocked his potential and increase his income. He generated 6-figure income within 2 years while working full-time as an engineer. At the point when he thought that the business can become the main income, he quit his full-time job and put his all into Unilever Life. As a result, he accumulated more than 30 million THB and continues to create passive income endlessly.
settings.content:
An executive engineer of a big electronic Japanese company had always believed that this job was the right job and hoped to entrust his future to the company. However, his belief changed when his boss was immediately fired from the company, making him quickly rethink about his future.

The first time he listened to the introduction of Unilever Life business opportunity he did not take it seriously as he came because his friend asked him to. He just thought of buying the products and use them on this own. He tried running the business for seven months and started to earn consistent income each month, making him felt more interested in the business. 

When he started to learn about the business from his business coaches and Unilever Life, he unlocked his potential and increase his income. He generated 6-figure income within 2 years while working full-time as an engineer. At the point when he thought that the business can become the main income, he quit his full-time job and put his all into Unilever Life. As a result, he accumulated more than 30 million THB and continues to create passive income endlessly.

settings.title: Tanawat Ruangsawang - Suphitcha Chaiwat
settings.mb_intro: To build a stable family, Tanawat had tried many careers, including full-time employees and self-employed business owners, but nothing seemed to reach his goal. He still remembers the most difficult
settings.content:
To build a stable family, Tanawat had tried many careers, including full-time employees and self-employed business owners, but nothing seemed to reach his goal. He still remembers the most difficult times of his career during the economic crisis. The situation forced him to start a business with no capital. At that moment, he turned to network businesses, which only invest in the application cost. By comparing many businesses, Unilever Life caught his attention as it is a global company that offers world-class product innovation.

From the beginning, he started to study the business with only less than a hundred  baht a day. But when he started to do it with determination, three-figure income turns to six-figure a month. Today, he accumulates over 50 million THB along with many travel rewards. This is the true freedom of time and income. They are now able to travel the world, create memorable memories, and perform self developments through various seminars. Above all, this business can increase its value on its own, assuring that their loved ones will have stability for the rest of their lives. Also, they both can live their lives to the fullest without waiting after retirement.

settings.title: Darinee - Denanan Yordraj
settings.mb_intro: A police cadet who is interested in business ideas. Despite having to train hard and stay in boarding school all week, he did not let his free time pass.
settings.content:
A police cadet who is interested in business ideas. Despite having to train hard and stay in boarding school all week, he did not let his free time pass. He spent his weekend studying and trying out Unilever Life business. The business generated income although he was still a student. 

After his graduation, his passion for Unilever Life still continues. He continued to run the business along with becoming a police officer. The business grew from generating a four-figure income per month to six figures before he was 30 years old. It further grew after Darinee became his business partner. 

They challenged themselves by expanding the business globally, unlocking their potential to the next level. By using digital platforms, the business successfully expands to Malaysia, Singapore, and Laos. Consequently, the business has given them their dream home with a value of 10 million baht and BMW car before they reach 30 years old. Their happiness is to continue sharing business opportunities and pass on success to others.

settings.title: Natcha - Saenrux Visuthigosol
settings.mb_intro: Natcha dedicated everything to the textile factory business, including wealth, personal life, and family time. However, many obstacles emerged leading to a decrease in profit. While reviewing th
settings.content:
Natcha dedicated everything to the textile factory business, including wealth, personal life, and family time. However, many obstacles emerged leading to a decrease in profit. While reviewing their lives, they saw an image of a successful Unilever Life business partner who generates a lot of income but still has more freedom in life. They both turned to Unilever Life to create stability and passive income. Most importantly, the business can be passed on to their children in the future.

When they started the business, the negative perception toward this job that it is a job for people who have nowhere else to go has changed. They challenged themselves throughout their business journey and finally earned over 30 million baht. Despite the huge Bangkok flood crisis, Unilever Life generated 100,000 baht per month. They felt stability in this business, so they resigned from being a bank manager to build the business to its fullest potential. At the same time, it is to create a wealthy and stable family business. Their goal is to wish that in the future their children can choose to walk on their preferred path without worrying about money. They are confident that Unilever Life is a truly sustainable business that gives a chance for success for everyone.

settings.title: Pradubduan - Patipon Poungjun
settings.mb_intro: From a nurse who devotes her time to hospital work to a strong businesswoman with the same goal which is to take care of people and build a quality of life for her family. The difference that differs Unilever Life from being a nurse is to sustainably change her and other people's live ”
settings.content:
From a nurse who devotes her time to hospital work to a strong businesswoman with the same goal which is to take care of people and build a quality of life for her family. The difference that differs Unilever Life from being a nurse is to sustainably change her and other people's lives.

She used to dedicate her life to be a nurse. Giving all her time to work hard, trading her health for income. She got just a little sleep and once she woke up, she had to continue working. Consequently, her exhausted body began to deteriorate. The income of a nurse can never exceed a 24-hour of work. 

She knew Unilever Life along with the four-sided concept and passive income which open up her to see from a new perspective. When she tried the product and see the result, she was very impressed. The more she studied the business, the more she found opportunities of earning an extra income that no longer has physical and time limitations. With Unilever Life’s self-development courses, it expands her skill to be a strong businesswoman. She accumulated more than 30 million baht in revenue, which changed her and her family's lives for the better. Her children get to study abroad and travel to over 20 countries.

Nowadays, she passes on happiness and a self-designed lifestyle to others, along with sharing opportunities to change people’s lives.

settings.title: Pairoj - Jutamas Deelokpattanamongkol
settings.mb_intro: An engineer who had worked hard for 25 years in many companies found himself not wanting to be an employee for the rest of his life until he retires. As soon as he realized that Unilever had opened a new business opportunity that gave everyone the chance to bec ”
settings.content:
An engineer who had worked hard for 25 years in many companies found himself not wanting to be an employee for the rest of his life until he retires. As soon as he realized that Unilever had opened a new business opportunity that gave everyone the chance to become a business partner, he decided to take this opportunity and join Unilever Life with the confidence in the world's leading consumer goods giant for over a hundred years. 

Pairoj and Jutamas stick to the business idea that Unilever Life is a business of developing people, creating leadership, and making people in the society to have a better quality of life in every way, including stability for themselves and their families.  More importantly, it is also a business that can be passed on to their children as an inheritance. Their dedication today is like building a strong foundation for a strong family resulting in a never-ending reward. This is a difference that no other business has.

settings.title: Kannitcha Phetsuk - Thitiphan Komolwiwat
settings.mb_intro: Kannitcha, a teacher, and Thitiphan, an engineer, seek new business opportunities to earn extra income. Therefore, they joined Unilever Life. They started by running the business after ”
settings.content:
Kannitcha, a teacher, and Thitiphan, an engineer, seek new business opportunities to earn extra income. Therefore, they joined Unilever Life. They started by running the business after their usual work and studying the business seriously. Consequently, they strengthen their business until it consistently provides a 6-figure income per month. This is when Thitiphan decided to quit the usual job and focus all attention on Unilever Life. It is their first time to ever accumulated more than 10 million baht in revenue. Additionally, they are impressed with the opportunity from Unilever Life to travel to over 30 countries around the world.  

They always said that they started with nothing. If they still work in their old jobs, it will take until retirement to pay off all debts. There is no way for their monthly salary to jump to 6-figure. The couple aims to share these life-changing opportunities with everyone who seeks success.

settings.title: Puongkeo - Tharin Utainrat
settings.mb_intro: A mother and a child who faced a significant lost when the leader of the family had passed away unexpectedly. However, they both were able to bring the family to overcome the crisis without worrying
settings.content:
A mother and a child who faced a significant lost when the leader of the family had passed away unexpectedly. However, they both were able to bring the family to overcome the crisis without worrying about financial stability due to Unilever Life business. Unilever Life is considered an asset that Mrs. Puangkaew and her husband paved the way for the future of their children. 

Mrs. Puangkaew was a teacher for more than 27 years and decided to resign and run a full-time Unilever Life business with her husband. Her husband initially managed Unilever Life business along with the other 4 businesses while their children were still in university. Unfortunately, the husband unexpectedly passed away, which drastically altered the family’s roles and fate. The 4 businesses gradually shut down during the economic crisis, leading to a 7 million debt.

 Luckily, Unilever Life business that the eldest son, Tharin, managed after his father still went well. Tharin saw the business opportunity, so he managed this business instead of becoming a regular employee in a company. Tharin became a business partner with his mother. They both developed skills and exceed their potential until they become a perfect businessman and woman. Revenue from Unilever Life business has become the family’s main income that paid off all debt. Moreover, they were able to pay for the two younger sisters' tuition fees. Nowadays, they achieve over 30 million THB revenue and receives international travel awards to more than 20 countries around the world.

settings.title: Sahaveaparch Phongjiraangkkoon
settings.mb_intro: A real estate businessman who faced high costs and many more problems from his business had always been stressed, so he started to question "happiness" and look for a business that can provide a balan ”
settings.content:
A real estate businessman who faced high costs and many more problems from his business had always been stressed, so he started to question "happiness" and look for a business that can provide a balanced, wealthy, and sustainable life. 

When he learned about Unilever Life business, he decided to join as a business partner. He began to learn about the products and business from the beginning. When he seriously study and try the product on his own, he found an impressive product result and a rewarding income plan. For this reason, he continues the business without any doubt. Every time he shares the business story with friends, he does it with the happiness of sharing a great opportunity with others. 

For Sahaveaparch, Unilever Life is like growing a mango tree. It takes years to see the results. But once you see the mango or the result, you’ll be able to eat the fruit forever. You have to fully understand the nature of the business. In the beginning, you may feel that it’s not easy and started to give up. Remember this: Before you see the “result,” you have to create a “cause” that is ready in all aspects first, including leadership, experience, and relentless self-development. When it's ready, you'll definitely see spectacular results.

settings.title: Mantanasorn - Thitipan Tantiyapinant
settings.mb_intro: A young woman with a passion for businesswoman took care of her own family and businesses. However, she felt trapped regardless of the good profits because she had to trade for negative health. She had been thro
settings.content:
A young woman with a passion for businesswoman took care of her own family and businesses. However, she felt trapped regardless of the good profits because she had to trade for negative health. She had been through many life-changing situations before knowing Unilever Life, which meets all aspects of her life. The more she knows Unilever Life, the more she loves the business.

She grew up in a furniture export family business. The business went well, expanding and recruiting more employees all the time. Unfortunately, a big fire damaged the factory overnight, which cost her over a hundred million THB. A stable and big business was shut down. Later, she shifted to run her own business of handmade jewelry. However, it required high-skilled workers. So, if workers did not come to work, she had to do all work by herself. Until one day, she woke up and can’t stand straight. It was when the doctors declared that she had tumors in her thyroid, uterus, and gallbladder. As a result, she thought to herself, “What did she work for?” Luckily, the tumors are not bad, though it changed her perspective of work. 

During her skin recovery after the surgery, a person recommended her to use Unilever Life’s skincare product. The result was very satisfying. After she took the Unilever Life’s business course, she was fascinated by the four-sided money concept. At one point, in addition to being rich, there was also a free lifestyle. She has been in the Unilever Life business until now, accumulating more than 10 million THB in revenue and sharing this opportunity with people who want to transform their lives like her.

settings.title: Angkana- Rachod Prayong
settings.mb_intro: Two businesspeople were born from a well-equipped family. Mrs. Angkana graduated from Wattana Wittaya Academy and graduated with a Bachelor of Business Administration in Human Resource Management at the University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce. Aft
settings.content:
Two businesspeople were born from a well-equipped family. Mrs. Angkana graduated from Wattana Wittaya Academy and graduated with a Bachelor of Business Administration in Human Resource Management at the University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce. After that, she studied for her master's degree in the UK in International Marketing Management.

After graduating, the couple parted to work a full-time job. Mrs. Angkana worked as a ground service officer at several well-known airlines. Knowing the business, Unilever Life, from the introduction of an adult relative, she applied for it but did not care until the time when she was transferred to Suvarnabhumi airport. She decided to resign as a company employee so she could have time to study the Unilever Life business. Meanwhile, after Mr. Rachod graduated from England, he worked as a resort manager in Rayong. The couple found a turning point in their life goal and had a clear dream when they became pregnant with their first child.

Mr. Rachod changed his perception toward Unilever Life business after he saw Mrs. Angkana’s success. Together, the couple was able to generate revenue about hundreds of thousands of THB per month and accumulated over 10 million THB in revenue. What's more important is that they both have freedom in life. They have become a family of young businesspeople who can manage their own time. They have time to do activities, while taking care of the two children. Also, they get to develop their skills and potentials.

settings.title: Pasutorn Utaiveedumrong - Naruemon Kongkun
settings.mb_intro: A police officer, specialized in investigating, has been working and risking his life for more than 30 years. He was passionate about his profession and never thought of running a business before. With the life of a police detective who always tracks down and arrests culprits, he never has time t ”
settings.content:
A police officer, specialized in investigating, has been working and risking his life for more than 30 years. He was passionate about his profession and never thought of running a business before. With the life of a police detective who always tracks down and arrests culprits, he never has time to take care of himself. In his free time, he spent it drinking alcohol during the night. Sleeping late at night and using only a single bar of soap from head to toe. Until his boss recommended him to take a face test at Unilever Life shop, he was shocked by the result. His face was dark, oily, and full of pimples and large pores. Making him decided to buy the first foam wash in his life, which was a turning point that led him to earn over 10 million THB. 

After seeing the results, his boss suggested him to buy more creams and sunscreens and said, "If the product results are satisfying, you can use it as a business." His face has improved more and more, making people started to ask about the products he used. The first month he earned 3,900 THB, the third month was 19,000 THB, and finally increased to 30,000 THB in the 8th month, which was more than his 10-year police career salary.  Despite the pause of running Unilever Life business to train police cadets for 3 months, he still earns 50,000-60,000 THB per month. With his ambition to earn 6 figures, he decided to resign from being a police officer.

Despite being told by many police friends and people around him that he’ll have a good life after retiring as police, he still thinks that Unilever Life is a business that will make his life successful, stay healthy, and wealthy without waiting for retirement. He can start to feel happy today, not waiting for after retirement. At present, he earns an average income of 100,000 THB per month and has a property where he and his family can live comfortably.

settings.title: Chutiwan Chairat
settings.mb_intro: A young woman who follows her mother's dream of becoming a nurse, but never have the chance to take care of her mother when she’s sick. Her salary is not enough to live in Bangkok. She resigned from be ”
settings.content:
A young woman who follows her mother's dream of becoming a nurse, but never have the chance to take care of her mother when she’s sick. Her salary is not enough to live in Bangkok. She resigned from being a nurse and tried Unilever Life business, which was against her mother’s dream. She asked for a year to prove she could make a 100,000 THB salary. In half a year, she earns 100,000 THB per month, and by the end of the year, the accumulated income exceeds millions of THB. 

She started to know Unilever Life by seeking a good product to take care of herself. The result was very satisfying, so she recommended her friends and earned bonus income from it. Hence, she applied for Unilever Life business partner. The major incident that led her to resign from being a nurse was when she had to work overtime for nine days without resting. Salary from that month did not even reach 17,000 THB, whereas working at Unilever Life for only 3 days a month earned her 30,000 THB. The clear result pushed her to stop following her mother’s dream and began Unilever Life business, promising her mother that if she could not earn over 100,000 THB per month within one year, she would go back and work as a nurse for the rest of her life. 
Although she did not pursue her mother’s dream as a nurse, she completed her mother’s dream of flying abroad. This business shortens the time of making enough money to buy houses and cars. She has time for her family and children as well as exercise.  She has accumulated more than 10 million THB in revenue. Now, her bigger goal is to achieve a bright and limitless future for her children.

settings.title: Preeyaporn - Sittisak Pornprasitsuk
settings.mb_intro: She was born into a fully equipped family. She has a good social status, financial status, and education. She was married to a district chief and opened a bakery, which made a satisfying income. The bakery has been running for 18 years when she learned of the Unilever Life business. She decided to close the bakery that she loved because she saw a bigge ”
settings.content:
She was born into a fully equipped family. She has a good social status, financial status, and education. She was married to a district chief and opened a bakery, which made a satisfying income. The bakery has been running for 18 years when she learned of the Unilever Life business. She decided to close the bakery that she loved because she saw a bigger and limitless opportunity. Less physical work and less time consuming than a bakery business. Instead, the business provides higher incomes and more time to live a better life.

She applied for Unilever Life business partner. Originally, she was only interested in buying the products for use. But seeing examples of successful people who do this business, she is committed to studying the business seriously. She was certain that the business would increase her potential and took her further with not only an increase in revenue but an increase in time for her beloved family. Giving her the opportunity to do social work and travel around the world with Unilever Life’s VIP trip. 

Unilever Life has built a secure six-figure revenue, giving her the time and freedom of life. She spent months with her daughter, who had been studying in the United States for months, while Unilever Life's revenue never stopped. At present, she has accumulated revenue of more than 10 million THB.

settings.title: Amornrat - Suchart Pattarapaisansin
settings.mb_intro: Amornrat and Suchart moved to Surin after marrying. Amornrat didn’t want to be a housekeeper only, but also interested in having a business. She started with spa business. Also, she had the opportunity to know Unilever Life but it left her with many concerns. When she studied ”
settings.content:
Amornrat and Suchart moved to Surin after marrying. Amornrat didn’t want to be a housekeeper only, but also interested in having a business. She started with spa business. Also, she had the opportunity to know Unilever Life but it left her with many concerns. When she studied and talked to business coaches, she clearly saw a business opportunity that matched with their goals.

When the goal is clear, the couple decided to become business partners by opening Unilever Life shop branch in Surin as well as build a strong team. The couple's network began to expand from one district to many more districts. Although they thought of Unilever Life as a source of extra income, after a year, they discovered that the business had become the family’s main source of income. Another big opportunity is learning to adjust their perspective on life. From doing business for ourselves to running a business to change someone else's life, help them succeed, and live a better life.

With a business platform that can be done online and offline along with support in every aspect from Unilever Life, the business grew further, accumulating revenue of more than 10 million baht. Their health improved and their lives are filled with travel rewards. Most importantly, Unilever Life can also be passed on as a value-added asset for their children.

settings.title: Natprapat Jiaraopasakul - Thananrat Jaraslertsiri
settings.mb_intro: After Natprapat experienced a turning point in life from the economic crisis, the family's wholesale business changed from earning almost a million per day to less than a thousand baht. Plus, he almost died in an accident. He realized that she had to do something for a stable life. Cons”
settings.content:
After Natprapat experienced a turning point in life from the economic crisis, the family's wholesale business changed from earning almost a million per day to less than a thousand baht. Plus, he almost died in an accident. He realized that she had to do something for a stable life. Consequently, he became Unilever Life’s business partner during his sophomore year.

After Thananrat graduated from investment and economics, she continued her family business, a dyeing factoring and apartments. Meanwhile, a friend invited her to do business with Unilever Life, which enabled her to find a risk-free business that does not require a big investment.

At present, they both earn hundreds of thousands of baht per month. Their goal is to receive a passive income of 1 million baht monthly, travel around the world as they have dreamed of, own real estate, and let the money increase by itself. It’s a lifestyle of the new generation with passive income. Most importantly, they both can work online from anywhere in the world. The true freedom of life.

settings.title: Nichapha - Chatchan Chotthaweephok
settings.mb_intro: At the beginning of the business with Unilever Life, they both owned an industrial franchise business that was going well. The project ”
settings.content:
At the beginning of the business with Unilever Life, they both owned an industrial franchise business that was going well. The project was about to open two branches, but they decided to hold the second project to do business with Unilever Life because they saw greater opportunities and focused on creating a passive income system.

Ms. Nichapha graduated with a master's degree in industrial and organizational psychology at Thammasat University and has been studying human resources in Japan for 8 months. Then, she returned to work as a master's degree professor at Thammasat University. On the other hand, Mr. Chatchan graduated with a bachelor's degree in engineering and began to work for a potential company and earning a satisfying salary. 

In the beginning, they both thought they know it all, assuming that managing Unilever Life business is the same as other business. However, after they adjust their plan with the business nature, the result was satisfying. Later, the couple made a big decision again by selling all existing franchisees and doing business with Unilever Life full time. Starting from a 600-registration fee, the result is much greater than they had ever dreamed of. Receiving houses, condos, cars, VIP trips from this business, and the quality of life they dreamed of. Nowadays, they have accumulated more than 10 million THB in revenue.  They both don’t only achieve passive income, but also experience sustainable happiness.

settings.title: Sangkae Hirundechthana - Bhubase Watcharahirun
settings.mb_intro: A couple of engineers and accountants who work overtime and run businesses to provide money for their families. Hoping to re ”
settings.content:
A couple of engineers and accountants who work overtime and run businesses to provide money for their families. Hoping to retire soon and retire wealthy. However, they found that making OT has an income ceiling, while owned businesses have a lot of limitations. But when they started Unilever Life business, they created hundreds of thousands of income, which was a big step toward their dream of quick and wealthy retirement.

Mr.Bhubase was a sales engineer for a major company that runs a number of private businesses alongside full-time jobs. Both car care and karaoke booths in the mall, however, depend on the location of the storefront and the customers who run in. This made him looked for new and possible businesses. Meanwhile, Sangkae, an accounting officer, who only earns a little extra from OT, had a face problem and tried Unilever Life's products. For just one week, her friends started to acknowledge the better difference so she applied for Unilever Life business. In the first month, she earned 900 THB a month. Then, she earned 4,000 THB on the next month, which is more than the maximum OT. 

When they studied this business, they were convinced and believed that this was a risk-free business with unlimited expansion. Also, the business provides a ready-to-use business platform that they don’t have to invest any money at all. It is also a property that can be passed on to their child. Due to all benefits from the business, he resigned to do Unilever Life business fully. Generating revenue of hundreds of thousands per month and accumulating over 10 million THB in revenue. The money from this business allowed them to buy their dreamed home and car, while traveling abroad with the whole family. Moreover, Unilever Life business fastens a wealthy retirement and provides many life rewards along the way.

settings.title: Kanchana Kharuwan
settings.mb_intro: Despite earning 20,000 baht per month from Unilever Life, it's not enough for her to support her family. Therefore, she considered her executive position as the main income and Unilever Life as a source of earning extra money. However, when she was laid off from her company, it shifted her ”
settings.content:
Despite earning 20,000 baht per month from Unilever Life, it's not enough for her to support her family. Therefore, she considered her executive position as the main income and Unilever Life as a source of earning extra money. However, when she was laid off from her company, it shifted her perspective toward Unilever Life business and turn this crisis into an opportunity. 

With Unilever Life's registration fee of only 600 THB, she immediately decided to join the business because she wanted to earn extra money to support her family. At first, she did not know the nature of the business. Consequently, she earned over 20,000 THB per month while she still worked as an executive. Once she was laid off, she knew that spending her money investing in building a business does not worth it because money could be lost without anything in return. 

For this reason, she chose to invest in Unilever Life business due to its holistic platform, low investment, and passive income. Also, the business offers her financial and time flexibility allowing her to spend time with her family which improves her physical and mental health. Meanwhile, she enjoys her travel domestically and internationally. Now, she has accumulated over 10 million baht of revenue from Unilever Life. With more valuable assets, she ensures her parents' happiness throughout their lives without worry.

settings.title: Thipparat - Sathit Sinthuurai
settings.mb_intro: A couple who want to design their own life. They want to step away from the limitations of company employees and global official's life. Also, they wish to lead their family to success togeth ”
settings.content:
A couple who want to design their own life. They want to step away from the limitations of company employees and global official's life. Also, they wish to lead their family to success together. Today, they have accumulated over 10 million baht from Unilever Life. More importantly, the business offers freedom where they can manage their own schedule, life, and receive a lot of VIP domestic and international travel awards at no cost.

Mrs.Thipparat works as a full-time employee of a leading telecommunications company, while Mr. Sathit served as an air force officer. They both are looking for alternative jobs that allow them to design their own lives. When they knew about Unilever Life, they felt that Unilever Life is different from other businesses. Unilever Life promotes learning, potential development, business concept development, which enable everyone to expand their business and skills. Not only is the business an option to make unlimited income, but also provides an independent lifestyle. Just make yourself like a presenter, using the products and sharing its fantastic result. It is a simple start but give tangible returns, which can generate 6 figures a month. 

Unilever Life business can truly meet what they've been searching for. It improved their quality of life. Assisting the couple to purchase a home, have a car, and earn more assets. All of these emphasize the couple's confidence in Unilever Life business in its unlimited opportunity and stability. Experiencing the true freedom of life.

settings.title: Kitidej Jaisua
settings.mb_intro: An electrical engineer whose salary and OT did not match with his monthly expenses and dream. When he met Unilever Life, the business introduced him to freedom in lifestyle and assisted him to accumulate over 10 million baht where he no longer has to stop dreaming big. ”
settings.content:
An electrical engineer whose salary and OT did not match with his monthly expenses and dream. When he met Unilever Life, the business introduced him to freedom in lifestyle and assisted him to accumulate over 10 million baht where he no longer has to stop dreaming big. 

Even though an electrical engineer career has a high salary, it still does not cover all expenses. Therefore, he had to do OT to increase income along with getting an additional job of designing and laying out electricity. One day, his friend introduced him to the business, Unilever Life. In the first few years, he managed the business along with his other jobs. Unilever Life generated 5 figures monthly. At that time, his grandmother with diabetes fell on the floor, leading him to a change of heart as he had to fully take care of his grandmother. He decided to resign from his full-time job and aimed to create passive income with Unilever Life since the business offers time flexibility. With this business, he got to take care of his grandmother during her final three years of life.

He dreamed of taking his family around the world. Unilever Life assists him in achieving this dream. Today, he has accumulated more than 10 million baht from Unilever Life, which also unlocks his potential, creates a passive income, and allows him to share this opportunity of success with others.

settings.title: Jirapat Waiyupattanatee - Rungsak Kankloy
settings.mb_intro: Inspired by a book, Rich Father Teaches His Child, Mrs. Jirapat chose Unilever Life business as a means to achieve the goal of quick and rich retire ”
settings.content:
Inspired by a book, Rich Father Teaches His Child, Mrs. Jirapat chose Unilever Life business as a means to achieve the goal of quick and rich retirement. Altering to a business owner who has a free lifestyle. Although starting the business with a negative attitude towards herself, she has shifted her perspective through learning that the heart of the business is to share opportunities for others. Today, she earns 6 figures a month and has accumulated over 10 million baht in revenue.

In the past, she ran an accounting office with more than 100 clients. Despite her 10 years of experience, she still could not see a way to achieve quick and rich retirement. After reading a book, she found that a business like Unilever Life does not require a big investment and it also offers passive income, which assists her in achieving the retirement dream. However, in the beginning, she started the business with a negative attitude because she viewed herself as fat, unattractive, old, and too quiet. She doubted herself in succeeding in the business. She almost gave up. But with the love of Unilever Life more than her previous job, she decided to try. She asked for advice from a business coach and attended numerous learning courses. Eventually, hard work pays off. Today, she earns 6 figures a month and accumulated over 10 million baht in revenue. 

Mrs. Jirapat and Mr. Rungsak both run the business with high spirit. All family members use Unilever Life products, enhancing both their beauty and health. Financial stability guarantees the family's future and Unilever Life can also be passed on as an asset to their children.

settings.title: Malliga Chadprasert
settings.mb_intro: Despite her childhood dream of becoming a business owner, it is still inevitable to work a full-time job. She hoped to gather as much experience and money as possible. However, after she knew ”
settings.content:
Despite her childhood dream of becoming a business owner, it is still inevitable to work a full-time job. She hoped to gather as much experience and money as possible. However, after she knew Unilever Life, the business fulfilled her dream of owning a million-baht business without waiting for funds as it has a holistic platform already provided for her.

Miss Malliga was an accountant who dreamed of having her own business but was struggling with investments. After meeting with a former colleague, she was amazed by his huge change in appearance. He told her that he was currently running a business with Unilever Life and about to resign from his old job. His bold decision surprised her as he was courageous enough to risk in the business. Consequently, she decided to join the business too as it requires only 600 baht of the registration fee. Over one year, she earns 6 figures a month and able to buy a condominium. Later on, she quit her full-time job to give all of her time to Unilever Life.

The reward that is far more precious than money is an opportunity to take her mother to travel the world. Traveling abroad has always been her mother's biggest dream for 20 years. Her mother used to be a government official, so she had never traveled overseas as she had to save money for Miss Malliga. This is why Miss Malliga is very determined to efficiently manage the business to win Unilever Life's international travel award. The business has immensely changed their lives.

settings.title: Oranuch - Bumrung Jiraaroon
settings.mb_intro: Because the couple already has financial stability in their full-time job, Unilever Life business never crosses their minds. They only register
settings.content:
Because the couple already has financial stability in their full-time job, Unilever Life business never crosses their minds. They only register as a member to buy the products. They never thought of turning it into a business. Until one day, the couple sought to find security for the family. Consequently, they got interested in Unilever Life because being an employee lacks stability whereas building their own business has high risk. 

It all started with being Unilever Life's customers. They saw changes in their skin after using the products. Also, their health is better for more than 5 years. Mr. Bumrung worked as a bank manager, while Mrs. Oranuch was a lecturer. When the couple started to plan for retirement, they began to look for a business that would help them to earn money in the future. At first, they thought of buying a convenience store's franchise. However, after the couple consulted with their sister and brother-in-law who recommended Unilever Life products to them, they suggested studying Unilever Life as a business. The couple found that the business can generate unlimited income and become a family's stability. In the early years, just using their free time from full-time jobs, they generated more than a million baht. For this reason, the couple quit their full-time jobs.

In addition to generating over 10 million baht from Unilever Life, the couple got an opportunity to take their whole family to travel abroad for free to more than 20 countries across the world. Comparing to their 25 years of full-time work, the couple had traveled overseas only once. Joining Unilever Life allows the couple to access development and learning courses, giving a clearer life goal, creating a positive attitude, and gaining great relationships. Needless to say, the couple's life is better in every possible way.

settings.title: Tassanee Sriinsuth - Ekachai Huajaipet
settings.mb_intro: Businesspeople who are interested in digital marketing which is the current world's trend. Accordingly, the couple chose to be business partners with Unilever Life that provides a global business platform
settings.content:
Businesspeople who are interested in digital marketing which is the current world's trend. Accordingly, the couple chose to be business partners with Unilever Life that provides a global business platform that covers social network marketing.

It started with the love of two people from different family backgrounds. Ekachai was a farmer's son who graduated from scholarships and loans. The salary of a mechanical engineer started at only about 10,000 baht. On the contrary, Tassanee, his girlfriend, was a miller’s daughter. The family business has hundreds of millions of baht a year. But one thing that the couple has in common is the dream of having their own business. They own many businesses including a restaurant and gift shop. The income was very good, but they were also very tired. Also, whenever they stop, the income stops. They realized that these businesses were not the answer to their independent lifestyle. So, they looked for a new business.

Later, they got to know Unilever Life. Paying for only hundreds of registration fee to become a business partner with Unilever, a global company. The business model matches the lifestyle of consumers in the digital era, which offers both online and offline platforms. From belief to a decision to action, they succeed with over 10 million baht, owning real estate, and having the lifestyle they want. Having the chance to travel the world with Unilever Life and deliver life-changing opportunities to other people.

settings.mb_intro: Graduated from Chulalongkorn University, she worked as a marketer of a leading building materials company and believed t”
settings.content:
Graduated from Chulalongkorn University, she worked as a marketer of a leading building materials company and believed the career is more stable than Unilever Life, which her best friend joined. Miss Sujitra joined Unilever Life with the purpose to pull her friend out of the business. On the contrary, she was amazed by the business concept. The more she does, the more fun it gets. Deciding to join Unilever Life is the best decision she has in her life. 

Despite the initial reason behind joining Unilever Life business, she fell in love with the business. Unilever Life offers the freedom to manage time, teamwork, and a community who always support each other. Once she's 100% confident with the business, she resigned from her old job. On the other hand, Mr. Wisoot graduated from Kasetsart University major in humanities. He's the third-generation heir to the family business. However, he sought a new business model that aligns with the current disruption. He was fascinated by Unilever Life's business model with a risk-free and modern platform as well as passive income.

Within just three years of dedication to the business, they achieved the target revenue of 6 figures per month. Contrary, as a full-time employee, it could take them over 10 years to achieve this number. Building their own business would also use more than 600 baht, unlike Unilever Life. Now, the business enables her to make unlimited income to support their family.
