She started her business by trying every Unilever Life products, from skincare to healthcare products. The results amazed her. She doesn't have to use top beauty brands anymore. It gives her the confidence to put all her dedication to the business. The more she got involved in the business, the more she got impressed by it. Whether it's the innovative premium products, Life Max Plan, business platform, and the executives' vision. She intends to pass on this beloved business to her daughter as she's confident that Unilever Life is the best business, an asset that never ceases to double its value. Creating sustainable stability for her child. 

Not only passing on the business to her daughter, but she also intends to introduce the business to the new generations for them to thrive with Unilever Life. Aiming to develop their attitudes, having clearer goals, developing leadership, and having a quality of life in all aspects.

She was greatly in debt. But Unilever Life transformed her life, assisting her to eventually earns more than 30 million baht. With this business, she was able to send her daughter to study fashion design in France and sent her son to study sound engineerin
settings.content:
A businesswoman of advertising, public relation, and production house who invested over 10 million baht on the businesses but unfortunately got hit by the IMF's economic downturn. She was greatly in debt. But Unilever Life transformed her life, assisting her to eventually earns more than 30 million baht. With this business, she was able to send her daughter to study fashion design in France and sent her son to study sound engineering.

Although the PR and production house business has become popular during a strong economy, there are many competitors as well. In the past 20 years of doing this business, she had to compete with pricing and invest in tools that cost over 10 million baht. During the economic crisis, she met Unilever Life. At first, she does not believe that only a 600 baht investment can change her life. However, after trying the products and sharing the good results, she started to take the business seriously. She realized that her prior job produces active income, where big investment might not always give back a big return. On the contrary, investing 600 baht in Unilever Life creates passive income. 

Today, she has accumulated more than 30 million baht in revenue from Unilever Life business. Having the time to take full care of her family and children and pursue their dreams by sending her daughters to fashion design in France and sending her son to study sound engineering with money from Unilever Life business.

Mrs. Nongluck is familiar with running a business as she grew up seeing her father running a business her entire life. She fought hard to run her own business. Trying many types of business. Her ultimate goal is to keep the family happy and have a good quality of life. Meanwhile, Mr. Prasupsuk previously worked at a tobacco factory. The couple wishes to own a business that offers flexible working hours and flexibility to set their own income. Therefore, both choose Unilever Life because they believe in Unilever. They enjoy the new challenges that Unilever Life offers, especially winning global travel awards. 

The couple is committed to providing the best education for their three children. As a result, they were able to send their children to study abroad, especially their son who earned money from the business to study in the United States for three years. The couple was able to live with their children and grandchildren abroad without affecting the business because they can manage the business online through social media. The couple also enjoys educating and developing new potential with Unilever Life and experience life rewards through travel rewards across the world.

settings.title: Phurita Suttamard - Chalermkiat Sikiwat
settings.mb_intro: A couple whose lives are so different as if they came from a different world. Mr. Chalermkiat was an electrical engineer who worked at night, while Mrs. Phurita worked in a private company during the day, making it almost impossible to see each other. At one point, they decided to restore ”
settings.content:
A couple whose lives are so different as if they came from a different world. Mr. Chalermkiat was an electrical engineer who worked at night, while Mrs. Phurita worked in a private company during the day, making it almost impossible to see each other. At one point, they decided to restore a warm family. The couple chose Unilever Life as the answer to make money and gather the family back.

Although the future income of the electrical engineering of a multinational company was good, the couple's relationship was not. The difference in working time prevents the couple from seeing each other. Moreover, his work took almost all of his personal time, preventing him from visiting his parents in the countryside. When his parent got sick, he can't even go home to take care of them. Mrs. Phurita thought that having a great job, good income, but doesn't have time to take care of each other still means that the family is not complete. While she was looking for a solution, she signed up and bought Unilever Life products. Her friends complimented that she looks better and bought the products from her. So, she decided to learn more about the business. Then, she realized how big the opportunity of this business holds. It is a chance for her to improve the quality of life of her family. The solution that the couple has always been looking for. 

Unilever Life's business delivers more returns than they both expected. In addition to the tangible returns, like accumulated revenue of over 10 million baht, they have opened up to a new experience from overseas travel, seminars from many famous speakers, and attending world-class courses. The family has become closer than ever and the couple has the chance to share this life-changing experience with other people.

settings.section_about_unilever_content:
Unilever Life is Unilever’s premium health and beauty products business. The business utilizes social network marketing via Entrepreneurial LIFE Platform, which is convenient, fast, and easy to use!

It is designed to drive the changes in people’s lives sustainably as well as create better income, health, beauty, and well-being. Our purpose is to create a sustainable living as much as possible.

settings.section_unilever_product_intro: Not only designing a platform that allows you to make unlimited income, but Unilever Life is also focused on researching and developing high-performance health and beauty products that meet the needs of our consumers to enhance their daily lives with our 3 quality products.

settings.feature_desc: beyonde selects only high-quality ingredients from high-quality sources that are certified and awarded by the World Pharmaceutical Institute of Nutrition. Get the most out of the raw materials in all of our products.
beyonde products are standardized by the Food and Drug Administration of Thailand (FDA). It also meets halal food standards by the Central Islamic Council of Thailand

beyonde has partnered with many of the world’s leading manufacturers of pharmaceuticals and health products, which use a strict CGMP (Current Good Manufacturing Practice) system to produce and control international quality - equivalent to pharmaceutical standards.

beyonde products have been verified by SEAC (Safety and Environmental Assurance Center). It is a team of industry-leading safety and environmental sustainability scientists, ensuring the best safety and efficiency.
